examples.example: 我从小就立志要成为一名对社会有贡献的人。

translate.english: I have determined to become a person who can make contributions to the society since I was a child.

examples.example: 他从小就对音乐有着浓厚的兴趣，并且一直努力追求自己的梦想。

translate.english: He has had a strong interest in music since childhood and has been constantly striving for his own dream.

examples.example: 他从小就保持着乐观积极的心态面对生活中的各种挑战。

translate.english: He has maintained an optimistic and positive attitude since childhood to face various challenges in life.
